meanings.definition: Having a stronger unpleasant odor than something else.
meanings.sent1: The garbage in the summer heat was stinkier than the old socks.
meanings.sent2: The skunk was much stinkier than the flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The stinkier cheese made the whole room smell funny.
meanings.sent4: His excuses were stinkier than the fish market on a hot day.
meanings.sent5: The stinkier smell lingered long after the source was removed.

meanings.sent1: The gym locker room was even stinkier after the game.
meanings.sent2: The socks in the laundry basket were getting stinkier by the day.
meanings.sent3: The stinkier shoes seemed to have a life of their own.
meanings.sent4: Her mood was stinkier than a skunk on a bad day.
meanings.sent5: The stinkier the situation, the quicker people wanted to leave.
